title: 假如你走着走着碰到了小黑，你会
author: 0x800f0922
txt_content: 别删！！！！！这是我第一次投票啊！！！

replies.author: 飞得更高
replies.txt_content: 那得看我有没有带南瓜头套，如果带了，果断拿起把剑就杀！！！
我会跳进水坑里！

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 头上方块3X3  完美虐杀

replies.author: 开山怪
replies.txt_content: 我会说你好像发水贴了。

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: ...马上低头。

replies.author: MC个人
replies.txt_content: 怕小黑干什么，再说很水唉此贴

replies.author: skywings
replies.txt_content: 小黑不怕的

replies.author: qq921894319
replies.txt_content: 怕什么，有着如此健壮的右手，撸趴他！

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content: 后期就干 前期就算

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content: 我会大喊！末地我来了

replies.author: 小白谔谔
replies.txt_content: 华丽的无视，或者使用四格方块法

replies.author: 拓也哥
replies.txt_content: 幹掉他!

replies.author: choak
replies.txt_content: /difficulty 0 - -很猥琐对不对 其实 我是直接和他对望

replies.author: ERBem
replies.txt_content: 从小黑旁边路过...

replies.author: 凹凸曼~~
replies.txt_content: 我会怒喊：我是斯巴达！（英语）...

replies.author: qwe81037090
replies.txt_content: 杀了他妥妥的
向他问个好。。。。。。。

replies.author: x434663529
replies.txt_content: 果断冲过去干它  a.a   干不过的话就看附近有木有水 ~  然后你懂得

replies.author: Kirbi
replies.txt_content:
脚底挖一格，
放上一桶水。
再瞄它一眼，
OK了。

replies.author: 岩浆害人
replies.txt_content: 打不过就和平大法
